# Introduction

[Massa Station](https://github.com/massalabs/station) is a modular applications, it is easily extendable with plugins, allowing users to customize and enhance its functionality. For instance, one can use plugins to develop a [wallet](https://github.com/massalabs/station-massa-wallet) or a node manager that allows you to easily run a node.

:::tip
In the context of Massa Station, the terms "plugin" and "module" are used interchangeably to refer to the same thing, which is an extension or additional functionality that can be developed to work with Massa Station.
:::

As a developer, you can easily build your own module, and add it to the store to make it accessible to all Massa Station users. At its core, a plugin is a binary that adheres to specific [guidelines](./guidelines).
